mapper.select: SELECT br.*, u.username, u.real_name as user_real_name, b.title as book_name, b.isbn as book_isbn, CASE br.status WHEN 0 THEN '借阅中' WHEN 1 THEN '已归还' WHEN 2 THEN '逾期未还' WHEN 3 THEN '逾期已还' END as status_desc FROM borrow_record br LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON br.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN book_info b ON br.book_id = b.id WHERE br.id = #{id} AND br.deleted = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE borrow_record SET status = 2 WHERE status = 0 AND due_time < #{now} AND deleted = 0
